name: MARTIAN JUSTICE
description:
HIGH NOON

Martian Justice is an isometric 3d shooting game with only one joystick and one button player controller. The player is the only Cowgirl alive in her motherland, the desolate desert of Mars. This land is being invaded by a vicious horde: dust thugs. Dust thugs will witness the Martian Justice firsthand.

Goal

The Player’s goal is to wipe out many enemies possible to get the highest score until she dies. 

Controllers:

Joystick: Moving

Joystick+Button: Shooting, AutoRun

Contributors:

Pedro Augusto de Almeida Soares: Programming, Techincal design Player Input design

Moulya Hadlahally Paramesh: Art, Level design, UI design, HUD design

Oguz Bicer: Project Management, Game designer, Tech Animation, Player design
